reviews.text: We stayed in a superior room and I think this is worth the extra penny (perhaps around SEK150 or so per night) as the room looks much more spacious. Nice and changing dinner buffet each night, and tea/coffee round the clock. We stayed in two hotels in Stockholm and we consider this one excellent for value.
reviews.title: Nice accommodation in a quiet neighborhood

reviews.text: If you come from the airport I suggest you take the Flybus. Cheap (SEK99) and convenient. It stops at City Terminal and you will have to make your way to the T-bahn Central Station, which is around 10 minutes (with luggage) on foot from the City Terminal. Take T14 direction Morby (green line) for 2 stops. You then alight at T-bahn Stadion station, from where the hotel is at most 10 minutes (again with luggage) on foot.
reviews.title: Comfortable rooms, nice location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We visited the Army Museum (recommended) and Saluhall, which are within walking distance from the hotel.
reviews.title: Good location, nice interior and food included!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel for business and I loved it! My room was very comfortable, quiet despite the streetside location and my bed was comfortable. This hotel is close to the Ostermalm station; about 5-10 minute walk. I also liked the free wifi throughout the hotel. The only thing I didnt like was the lack in diversity in breakfast and although I liked the concept of complimentary dinner, I found it disgusting.
reviews.title: A little far removed from the action, but lovely and a good value

reviews.text: We've just got back from a lovely stay in Stockholm and we stayed in this hotel for three nights. Firstly, for the price, the location is very handy. This hotel is situated just a few minutes walk away from the Stadion underground station, and from there it is only a five minute journey into the city centre. Alternatively, it is a pleasant 20 minute walk. Although the area itself is quite quiet, there are bars just a short walk away.
reviews.title: excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As Stockholm is known to be one of Europe's most expensive cities, smart choice of hotel can be a great budget saver. For this hotel we found an offer including breakfast, afternoon coffee break and dinner for 130 Euro per Standard room. Because prices for eating out in Stockholm are pretty high, these meals including in hotel price were real savings. There is wireless internet in rooms free of charge.
reviews.title: Good value hotel in quiet neighborhood

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Buffet breakfast is abundant : few types of bread and pastry, eggs, bacon, small hot-dog, butter, cheese (fresh cottage and brie), croissants, jam ( orange, apricot..), selection of ham and sliced cheese, lot of vegetables and fruits, few types of yogurt, selection of teas and juices and so on. What is great, lot of this stuff is organic which is clearly marked. For tea time you can choose between tea and coffee companied with usually fresh made cookies. Like on every meal, there is a bowl of fresh fruits you can choose from. Dinner is based on one main meal (usually traditionally Swedish - meat balls, salmon, chicken) with side dish (potatoes, pasta...) and great salad bar with dessert. Don't expect selection of few main meals, it's just one but we never went from dinner hungry. We especially liked their home made cheese cake with strawberry sauce and cream for desert!
reviews.title: Still a nice hotel
A very nice hotel with very good service
reviews.text: Standard room we were in is pretty small (reminded us of London:-) but cosy and comfortable. If you intend to stay a lot in room during day, consider upgrading room type. Room and bathroom are cleaned every day and rest od hotel is also clean and tidy. There is also nicely decorated small spa area with sauna and gym you can use free of charge. I liked military style of hotel decorations connected with building military past. There is memories of past in every part of hotel from symbols on carpet, old pictures to exhibitions of old military uniform next to lift on every floor. After meals we usually relaxed in comfortable and cosy lounge bar next to reception or in small terrace next to restaurant.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is located in quiet part of Stockholm, bit away from center. Metro station Stadion is just few minutes away, and you have 2 stops to T-centralen or 3 stops to Gamla Stan. Hotel is in Ostermalm part of city which is very quite residential area. We recommend that you go to Ostermalm market which is 10 minutes easy walk from hotel. Hotel stuff is very helpful and you really feel home like. You can buy transport tickets including tickets for Stockholm city bikes at reception. Only thing I would like better is selection of TV channels. There is 14 of them and except BBC news there are all Scandinavian channels.
reviews.title: I just LOVE this hotel!

reviews.text: We returned to this hotel for one night after staying there for a week a couple of years ago. Despite the lobby and dining room redecoration which leaves much to be desired, this is still a nice hotel that offers great value. The rooms are small but larger rooms are available. The location is good and the inclusion of breakfast and dinner makes this hotel a very good value.
reviews.title: Very good hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In a rather small room you have everything you need! There are even pegs, as well in the room as in the bathroom! It is not central in the city, but there are good and simple bus communication in the neighbourhood. It is perfect if you come the E28 or E4/E20.by car.
reviews.title: Quiet and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is one of the best ever hotels we stay around the world. Very friendly and helpful staff. Excellent breakfast and dinner buffet. Coffee fruits water newspapers for FREE 24h/day. All this in a quite expensive city. Try the weekend packages at the hotel's web page. Will give you VERY LOW PRICE better than elsewhere.
reviews.title: Just Excellent !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all a fantastic experience. 100% will stay again. Highly recommended to everyone.
reviews.title: Suprisingly good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: BRAVO TAPTO !!!
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.text: We staid at Clarion Collection Tapto for a weekend. We bought a weekend package.
reviews.title: Very good choice unless you intend only to shop and go out eating.

reviews.text: I was attending a company training in the Stockholm University which is near the hotel. I stayed here during four moduls, three nights each time. The hotel is quite small but very clean and nice. The location is not in the city center but I like it since it offers better wiev to true and old Stockholm. Rooms were cosy and the lobby bar also. Breakfast, not the best I have had but it was good and also they offered the snack during evenings also, which was quite nice. Staff was polite and I never had any problems during my visits. I can recommend this place.
reviews.title: True Stockholm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes this hotel deserves the ratings, certainly all aspects of the stay tick all boxes.
reviews.title: Enjoyable experience

reviews.text: The enthusiastic greeting on arrival by the receptionist carried throughout our stay, I will have to echo others comments to say they really are friendly, helpful and efficient.
reviews.title: Superb hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are on the smallish side but impeccable with all amenities provided including complimentary Wifi.
reviews.title: Excellent Value

reviews.text: The food provided was plentiful, fresh and enjoyable and breakfast, afternoon tea and dinner inclusive, which is a major factor in an expensive city as is Stockholm.
reviews.title: Excellent. Stay here when in Stockholm
